Barbazus, known also as bearded devils or infantry devils, are murderous fiends who satiate their lust for annihilation by serving as the foot soldiers of Hell’s armies, often leading hordes of lesser devils such as imps and lemures into battle. Bearded devils wield serrated glaives to inflict jagged gashes that resist healing magic, resulting in tremendous blood loss. When enemies come too close, bearded devils strike with the spines of their wriggling beards to deliver a wretched contagion called Avernal fever, savoring the sight of their victim’s strength being slowly devoured from within. Barbazus can be found savagely indulging the whims of evil infernal lords from all layers of Hell, rejoicing as they disseminate murder, misery, and anguish as they see fit. **[Recall Knowledge - Fiend](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 20 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 18 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 15 [Barbazu](/Monsters.aspx?ID=110) **Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 88 **Perception** +13; greater darkvision **Languages** [Celestial](/Languages.aspx?ID=16), [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2), [Infernal](/Languages.aspx?ID=19); telepathy 100 feet **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +11, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +13, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +10, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +11, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +11 **Str** +4 **Dex** +2 **Con** +4 **Int** -2 **Wis** +2 **Cha** +1 **Items** [Glaive](/Weapons.aspx?ID=20) --- **AC** 22 **Fort** +15 **Ref** +11 **Will** +11 +1 status to all saves vs. magic **HP** 60 **Immunities** [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72) **Resistances** physical 5 (except [silver](/Equipment.aspx?ID=379)), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126) 10 **Weaknesses** good 5 **Attack of Opportunity** --- **Speed** 35 feet **Melee** glaive +15 ([deadly 1d8](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [Evil](/Traits.aspx?ID=64), [Forceful](/Traits.aspx?ID=180), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 1d8+7 slashing plus 2d6 evil and infernal wound **Melee** claw +15 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Evil](/Traits.aspx?ID=64), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)), **Damage** 2d6+7 slashing plus 1d6 evil **Melee** beard +15 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)), **Damage** 1d6+7 piercing plus Avernal fever **Divine Innate Spells** DC 19 - **4th** [Dimension Door](/Spells.aspx?ID=69) (at will) - **5th** [Dimension Door](/Spells.aspx?ID=69) **Rituals** DC 19 - **1st** [Infernal Pact](/Rituals.aspx?ID=23) **Avernal Fever** ([Disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46)) **Saving Throw** DC 23 Fortitude; **Stage 1** carrier with no ill effect (1 day); **Stage 2** [enfeebled 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=13) (1 day); **Stage 3** [enfeebled 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=13) (1 day) **Infernal Wound** ([Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117)) A bearded devil’s glaive Strike also deals 1d6 persistent bleed damage that resists attempts to heal it. The flat check to stop the bleeding starts at DC 20. The DC is reduced to 15 only if the bleeding creature or an ally successfully assists with the recovery.
The DC to Administer First Aid to a creature with an infernal wound is increased by 5. A spellcaster or item attempting to use healing magic on a creature suffering from an infernal wound must succeed at a DC 21 counteract check or the magic fails to heal the creature. **Reposition** **Trigger** The devil hits a creature with a glaive Strike. **Effect** The devil moves the creature 5 feet in any direction. The destination square must be within reach of the devil’s glaive. This movement doesn’t trigger reactions. **Wriggling Beard** **Frequency** once per round. **Effect** The barbazu makes a beard Strike. This Strike ignores their multiple attack penalty and doesn’t count toward that penalty.
